entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the main character in this passage, and her cubicle is mentioned as a location where she is present.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of Hermione's friends who tries to talk to her through the cubicle door.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another friend of Hermione's who tries to talk to her and later reacts to her transformation.

entities.name: moaning myrtle
entities.description: Moaning Myrtle is a ghost who appears in the cubicle and seems happy about something.

entities.name: millicent bulstrode
entities.description: Millicent Bulstrode is mentioned as someone whose nose Hermione might have taken, but it turns out she has a cat instead.

relationships.description: Hermione transforms into an animal, specifically a cat, after taking the wrong potion.
Harry is friends with Hermione and tries to talk to her through the cubicle door.
Ron is also friends with Hermione and reacts to her transformation.
Moaning Myrtle seems happy about something related to Hermione's situation.
